mapper.select: SELECT dr.request_num, dr.request_date, LISTAGG(drd.request_detail_num, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY drd.request_detail_num) AS request_detail_nums, LISTAGG(drd.order_num, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY drd.order_num) AS order_nums, SUM(cod.order_detail_qty) AS total_order_qty FROM delivery_request dr JOIN delivery_request_detail drd ON dr.request_num = drd.request_num JOIN customer_order_details cod ON drd.order_num = cod.order_num WHERE dr.request_status LIKE '01' GROUP BY dr.request_num, dr.request_date ORDER BY dr.request_date DESC

SELECT order_num, recipient_name, order_addr, order_addr_detail, order_delivery_status, order_purchase_date, order_modify_date FROM Customer_Orders ORDER BY CASE WHEN order_modify_date IS NOT NULL THEN order_modify_date ELSE order_purchase_date END DESC

SELECT cod.order_num, cod.book_isbn, b.book_name, cod.order_detail_qty FROM delivery_request dr JOIN delivery_request_detail drd ON dr.request_num = drd.request_num JOIN customer_order_details cod ON drd.order_num = cod.order_num JOIN books b ON cod.book_isbn = b.book_isbn WHERE dr.request_num = #{request_num}
